name: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out!
storyline:
It was supposed to be another mundane day in the city, maybe also a trip to Dude's Coffee if you were lucky. But now, folk from all around the world are being kidnapped by millions of colored bricks that are falling from the sky at alarming rates!

The question now: who could possibly save us from this predicament...?
...
Oh. Him? Really?
summary: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out! is an arcade-inspired puzzle game all about using your trusty gun to launch a ball at breakneck speeds and rid your home of some uninvited guests! Taking the traditional brick-breaking formula of Breakout and combining it with the movement of Lethal League and the gunplay of classic run-and-gun shooters like Metal Slug and Gunstar Heroes, this game is sure to make a frantic, fast-paced romp for fans of gaming's granddaddies as well as the modern player looking for something unique!
